alert.note: Alert for Forsyth; Guilford; Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 8:26AM EST until February 07 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...A period of light freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch, especially on elevated surfaces. * WHERE...Forsyth, Guilford, and Person County in central NC. * WHEN...Through 1 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions, especially on bridges, will result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light freezing rain is expected to change over to all rain, as temperatures slowly rise to just above freezing, by 1 PM. Most ice accumulation will occur on elevated surfaces, including bridges.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for North Carolina can be obtained by visiting DriveNC.gov.
